name: Crime City Battle
description:
Enter the city of crime, auto theft, gangsters and sin, in this exciting free open world miami mafia game that takes to the streets of top crimes Vegas Gangster's city and its dangerous deadly criminals, gangster crimes and crime mafia in this secret city of vice. Your drive & steal cars, shoot up rival gang members, and explore the city crime

Features:
. Widescreen resolution support
. Beautiful new graphics
. Large map with different missions
. Exciting car to racing in the city
. Vegas city gangster
. Easy to control, play it in anywhere
. Real crime city simulator
